node.address: Calle 4 # 12-53, Barrio San Antonio Cali , Cali, Colombia

content.value:
The neighbourhood San Antonio is all about tradition and culture. Restaurants, bars parks, markets and commerce. Meet the locals who have been living in this colonial houses for generations. Its a sweet combination of music, tradition and happiness.

The room is equipped with air conditioning and each booth has its own lamp, electric outlet and locker. We also provide hot water and free WiFi, Cable TV and kitchen.

Set in Cali, 1.7 km from Jorge Isaacs Theater, Hostal Siete Rios Cali offers air-conditioned rooms and a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests.
The units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV. At Hostal Siete Rios Cali all rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom.
The accommodation offers a continental or à la carte breakfast.
Hostal Siete Rios Cali offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the guest house.

Popular points of interest near Hostal Siete Rios Cali include La Ermita Church, Artisan Park Loma de la Cruz and Cali's city Theatre. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Aragón International, 22 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

description.description: Siete Rios Hostel was inspired by the love of its co founders for their city, Cali. The main objective of this project is to be able to communicate the authentic lifestyle of the city. Carefree, always smiling and warm. Located in the most traditional and popular neighbourhood, Hostal Siete Rios is walking distance from all the point of interest of the city.
